item.title: 13 Benefits and side effects of borage oil
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Borage oil’s gamma-linolenic acid (GLA) content is responsible for its health advantages. One of the most important fatty acids. This oil is effective against a variety of skin conditions, including eczema. Additionally, the oil has anti-thrombotic (anti-blood clot) and anti-inflammatory properties. The numerous other health benefits of borage oil are also discussed in this article.… Read More »13 Benefits and side effects of borage oil
